title: Google\Cloud\OsConfig\V1\YumSettings
name: YumSettings
description:
Yum patching is performed by executing yum update. Additional options can be set to control how this is executed.

Note that not all settings are supported on all platforms.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.osconfig.v1.YumSettings

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.security
params.description: Adds the --security flag to yum update. Not supported on all platforms.

params.name: data.minimal
params.description: Will cause patch to run yum update-minimal instead.

params.name: data.excludes
params.description: List of packages to exclude from update. These packages are excluded by using the yum --exclude flag.

params.name: data.exclusive_packages
params.description: An exclusive list of packages to be updated. These are the only packages that will be updated. If these packages are not installed, they will be ignored. This field must not be specified with any other patch configuration fields.

methods.description:
